issue.body:

Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/py5jbchljq8g8skwsgcgwowkk8cwk089zwlon8k8vc.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
The issue was not reproduced even with AdGuard's standard filter settings and has been completely resolved.
Thank you for your efforts.
